mapper.select: select count(user_email) from user_mst where user_email = #{signUpEmail}

select count(pm.phone_number) + count(um.user_phone) as result from phonenumber_list_mst pm left outer join user_mst um on(um.user_phone = pm.phone_number and um.user_name = pm.phone_username) where pm.phone_number = #{signUpPhone} and pm.phone_username = #{signUpName}
mapper.insert: insert into user_mst values( #{signUpEmail}, #{signUpPassword}, #{signUpName}, #{signUpPhone}, now(), now() )
